9ee1c58a-3195-4e30-bd8c-f7fa30172590.description: The Unlocking Agility Training offers an introduction to the fundamentals of the Agile methodology and the importance of focusing on customer value and the continuous improvement of organizational processes. Get familiar with the Agile values and principles and learn how to deliver value in shorter iterations. You will also be introduced to the Agile team, where you can identify with certain roles and responsibilities.
9ee1c58a-3195-4e30-bd8c-f7fa30172590.name: Unlocking Agility

badge_template_activities.title: Active participation during the day and a half awareness training.
Successful completion of the course assignments which requires working in groups and successful completion of the recap quizzes run at the end of each module.

4c4f961e-940b-4234-85c5-457e1713fef4.description: Get introduced to and certified for ITIL 4 – the global standard for IT Service Management now updated to the needs of the modern digital world. This course is designed for anyone working in IT.

1b46c71c-f391-41fd-ad8a-aed5f7580110.description: Recipients of this badge attended the first webinar, "Chaos Engineering in Microsoft Azure", which was part of Microsoft Months - the biggest Microsoft sequence of events and training courses in Bulgaria, organized by ITCE. 96ede155-7ae6-42dc-8cdd-963c249386fa.description: In this course, you’ll gain an understanding of the role of a Scrum Master in a SAFe enterprise. The SAFe Scrum Master course explores the role of Scrum in the context of the entire enterprise and prepares you to successfully plan and execute the Program Increment (PI), the primary enabler of alignment throughout all levels of a SAFe organization. This includes learning the key components of scaled Agile development, and how Scrum is facilitated throughout the enterprise.
96ede155-7ae6-42dc-8cdd-963c249386fa.name: SAFe® Scrum Master

badge_template_activities.title: Active participation during the course delivered by accredited SAFe trainer
Successful completion of the course assignments which requires working in groups and successful completion of the practice exams run at the end of each lesson

05c2dcb4-3e31-407b-953f-39a03674ee78.description: During this course, you’ll learn the principles and practices of the Scaled Agile Framework® (SAFe) and what it means to lead a Lean-Agile transformation at enterprise scale

09b07bc3-fbc2-43b0-aeb4-8ad9ba4c7bfb.description: Develop the skillsets needed to guide the delivery of value in a Lean enterprise—and learn about the activities, tools, and mechanics used to manage backlogs and programs—by becoming a SAFe® Product Owner/Product Manager (POPM). During this course, attendees will gain an in-depth understanding of the Agile Release Train (ART), how it delivers value, and what they can do to effectively perform their roles.
09b07bc3-fbc2-43b0-aeb4-8ad9ba4c7bfb.name: SAFe® Product Owner/Product Manager

59f3ba39-8de1-4dbc-af22-a47d9b564a35.description: The DevOps Foundation course provides a baseline understanding of key DevOps terminology to ensure everyone is talking the same language and highlights the benefits of DevOps to support organizational success. 068c5e1b-694c-4b81-aaf1-e0f324a30007.description: ITIL® 4 Leader: Digital & IT Strategy focuses on the alignment of digital business strategy with IT strategy.
